name: Stranger of Sword City Revisited
storyline:
The airplane you were traveling on vanished mysteriously, without a trace.
You awaken to an unfamiliar starry night sky.
It is the Sword City Escario, where shining butterflies dance...
Before you lies a land of strange creatures, fearsome monsters, and countless mysterious labyrinths.
You are the Chosen One: The Stranger of Sword City.
summary:
From the present day, to the parallel world. Survive in the land of polar night!

The tried and true fundamental charms of the dungeon RPG genre, such as character creation, dungeon exploring, and item collecting, have been fully refined.

The minds behind many other hit games in the genre bring you an experience which you can enjoy to your heart's content.
